name: Global Game Jam Online 2021 Entry - Baggage Bonanza
name_original: Global Game Jam Online 2021 Entry - Baggage Bonanza
description:
Global Game Jam Online 2021 Entry - 'Lost and Found' Theme - Baggage Bonanza

A promotion has been promised to the hardest worker in the lost property office of a busy airport. As swarms of customers rush over to inquire about their missing luggage, you must race to deliver as much of it as possible. Whether their items are in one piece or shattered, it doesn't matter, so long as you get that promotion. So get throwing those expensive laptops and heavy suitcases!

Controls -

Player 1: Movement = WASD, Grab & Throw = F

Player 2: Movement = Arrow Keys, Grab & Throw = Right Control

P to Pause
